extendedInfo.description: MyScreenplays is a non-linear film screenwriter software for Android mobile devices.Something like Celtx or Final Draft but for Android.MyScreenplays uses an unique non-linear approach to mobile screenwriting. Whith this you can access to any element of your script and do whatever you want with it.Its like a non-linear video editor but for screenwriting.Main features are:Automatic format.Auto indent, auto format, auto upper case, automatic parenthetical, transitions...Automatic cover. Just insert your data in settings screen.Autocomplete for characters, locations and parenthetical directions.Smart automatic alternate on new dialogs. Changes the character who talks for it's own.Non linear edition. You can create edit and/or move your elements (dialogs, actions, sequences) like an non linear video editor. Just click on the arrows and slide.With a clipboard you can move or duplicate any element between different scripts or sequences. Use clipboard for store a screenplay with shots or any other coommon pieces.Export fully formatted hollywood standard screenplays.Exports in: -HTML (ready for print in industry standard)-PDF (requires internet connection)-Doc (to open your script and edit it in any word processor including google docs, microsoft word, openoffice, libreoffice...)-LaTeX (using standard LaTeX packages)-Celtx: you can export your scripts for using on a Celtx desktop/mobile aplication-Final Draft: Export for final draft screenwriter software.Imports:Screenplays from other devices shared on the cloud using google docs powerFinal Draft: load a .fdx file on your google docs and use it in myScreenplaysCeltx: load a .celtx file on your google docs account and import it in myScreenplaysYou can also use this app to convert a Celtx file into a Final Draft one and vice-versa!Headers in Italian, Portuguese, German, FrenchCreate new screenplays from scratch or using outlines as template.Cloud integrated with Google docs technology. You can export or import scripts using your google docs account.Share with other people and work together.Continue your work between many devices. (ie. your phone and your tablet).Voice input.(requires voice search from google).Outline:Treatment support using google docs technology. Just fill a form and apply it to your script or create an entire new one based on your outline.Treatment editor. Use it for your info, notes or whatever.Wysiwyg preview Edit directly on preview. Just click the element you want to change.Stats:Set target Page count Characters About Permissions:Permissions for accesing your Google docs account are required if you want to use cloud features like import/export, share and treatment.Also needs internet connection for PDF export.This is a Pro version without ads. Free version with ads it's also avaliable.At this point both versions are the same except for the ads.This can change in future versions.Please report any bugs you found!

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Except I found 1 pretty serious glitch. When I try to change the properties of a sequence within a script it either erases everything in the sequence or deletes the sequence entirely. I lost 3 hours worth of work just because I wanted to change the name of the sequence. Other than that I love it though. I will give it 5 stars when this glitch is dressed. I change things all the time and this makes me not even want to start writing something because I\'m afraid ill want to change it later...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A very handy tool for screen writers!
reviews.comment: Good app, but the interface could use some more polish. I really wish the developer would enhance/support this app more regularly. A Holo interface would be a big plus. Sometimes it\'s a little hard to figure out where to click for what I\'m looking for. I also wish the title page would have more flexible options, and to be set as its own page, rather than being placed at the top of the page where the script actually begins.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I was looking for. Writing scripts is so much fun. I have written several with this app. Its interface is perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: It needs on online interface, so we can work from a computer AND our phone, when needed.
reviews.author: Frank Agness

reviews.title: Looks like something that will greatly assist me
reviews.comment: I will admit to only tooling around with the sample script, as my own project is still in the pre-production stage, and not ready for me to actually put pencil to paper/fingers to keyboard. But from what I have seen so far, I am really liking what I am seeing for customization and ease of use.
reviews.author: Seth Brower

reviews.title: The app is awesome BIG BUT
reviews.comment: There should be a way to change character Names( long press on someone\'s name showing a menu to change the  characters name and description ) and it changes it everywhere on the screenplay. And if you accidentally push the back button it doesn\'t delete all that I  wrote.
reviews.author: Gilly Squeezington

reviews.title: Could get 5 but...
reviews.comment: It needs the option to send from Google drive or the phone... please code that in please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t ever paste anything
reviews.comment: Lost a load of work while trying to rejig a few scenes all because paste doesnt work correctly
reviews.author: Shaun Forsdyke

reviews.title: Love the app gives you a chance to write like the big dogs
reviews.comment: Great app works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not that bad.
reviews.comment: But transition placement is after the header. It needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: sagar mavani

reviews.title: needs work but best option for Android
reviews.comment: A little difficult to get going with Google Drive Outline Sequence Form. Needs a video tutorial,  crashes occasionally Nexus 10
reviews.author: Patrick Coble

reviews.title: Deletes scenes you want.
reviews.comment: I longheld a scene, clicked delete and it deleted the first scene in the script and left my target intact. Longheld another scene and it deleted something else important, again.Unacceptable bug.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Great app. Really useful for updates and writing on the go and for celtx and FD.  Had a small bug answer when reported was fixed in minutes!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very responsive developer
reviews.comment: I bought it and changed my rating from 1 to 5, after he fixed problem with import from Final Draft. Great! Unfortunately it can export it correctly into Final Draft 8 format.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps crashing when I load a final draft script
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super App!!
reviews.comment: I took a look at the free version (a few patches back even) for about 2 minutes before PAYING for the APP. For the fair and reasonable price it is a bargain. Thanks for the great App and keep up the good work. God Bless.  -Brother Charles-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Import issues
reviews.comment: After this update the app is now working great. Will be using it in my screenwriting classes. Xes is very responsive and responsible developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: For two bucks? This is a no brainer.  And since these scripts are just meant for my eyes and my team...shoot, I just use the voice recognition software to \"write\" most of it.   Holla.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally, an Android screenwriting program!
reviews.comment: The app (as all new software) takes a little time to learn, but I already see tremendous potential for constant use.   I can work on my screenwriting everywhere now because I always have my cellphone with me.   Unlike an obtrusive laptop or ipad, folks seeing me tapping away on my cellphone think I\'m just facebooking or texting, which is nice, because they don\'t interrupt with the annoying \"What are you doing?\" question.   The software will no doubt be even better over time.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User
